I actually always enjoyed going i to the Pell City store because of how easy they made it for me and how nice they were to me. I know Shane is the disrict manager, and I had the pleasure of seeing him again in the Talladega store today when I went in and got a payday loan. I recognized him right away and also inquired about Brooke.

Shane actually turned my whole
day around today! It was a pleasure doing business with him. Excellent experience. He is a keeper. Ty Shane.

Wendee

name: Dana Ford
text: Jason (center manager) was great in assisting me with a payday advance! He was very friendly and courteous! As I was waiting on approval of my application, a few customers came into the store and he seem to have known them all on an individual basis. I can tell his customers trust him and think a lot of him. He also showed the same commitment to each of his customers. One of his customers also made the comment that it is because of kind/caring people like himself that a company such as Advance America receive so many customers. I couldn’t agree more. Whether I am approved for my loan or not, I would definitely visit this branch again to be welcomed by such a kind, caring, young man! Thank you, Jason for making my borrowing experience a great one! I appreciate it! Dana

name: Dominique Jones
text: First of all they sent a check to my bank account that I had already made good on and than had the nerve to say it was my fault because I came in two days later. But even so if you knew that check was sent to my account why wasn’t I told when I came in to pay. They took my money and still let my account be billed for not having the funds available to cover the check. But not to mention the fact that I was told from the beginning that it wasn’t there check that was sent out. Now I’m out of more money than I was before I borrowed the money in the first place.

name: Cynthia Dowdell
text:
Hello Huntsville,
Recently, my daughter and I relocated here so that she can attend college. Now honestly Huntsville, I have met my share of rude people, but I cannot and I will not saying I'll make such a comment towards the two nice ladies who works at Easy Money which is located at 4820 University Drive. I don't understand why their ratings are only 2.7 which is ridiculous! From my personal experience Shenikka and DeDe are the most kind and humble hearted ladies I've met and we've been living here almost one year now. We all know that when you go into an office or business you expect people to become magicians but they work in customer service. And there are some very rude people that can come and expect whatever the situation is it should automatically be okay for them to adjust but it doesn't work that way! You have to be very kind to people if you want them to be kind to you. You have to be humble when you want someone to help you and you would get the same treatment in return. So don't be fooled by this low rating that you see on this Google app because it's not true. These ladies will work with you any kind of way they can and is done without prejudice. So when you go into this store you can ask for either of them and I guarantee you they will be nice, they will be kind, and they will be very understanding of your situation and if they can help you they will. But don't go into the office or any business with a bad attitude oh, because of you bring me a bad attitude you may get one in return depend on the situation. So be very nice and kind to them as you want them to be to you. Don't say something bad about someone just because you had a messed-up situation that could not be fixed so you want to get back at a person by giving them a bad review it doesn't work that way. Be nice and kind and you'll get the same results in return. laser doing a real good job I appreciate you and keep on doing what you doing because you doing good work for this community that's so need you. And if corporate does not appreciate you for the work that you do then maybe they should come and switch places with you to see the type of situation that you deal with everyday because I think you all are doing a hell of a job and from my standpoint from what I see with my own two eyes, keep doing what you doing because your proof in the pudding of good customer service and what it's about. If if corporate does not appreciate you just know that we do parrot God bless you keep up the good work and I'm praying for your safety there it is terrible crisis that we are now in but only temporarily. Thank you very much and God bless you👍💯😘

name: Bre Blanding
text:
If I could rate with no stars I would, but in order to leave a review I have to give this unprofessional establishment one star. I came to this unprofessional establishment today to pay my loan and I was not even greeted , the employee who took my payment had an attitude from the beginning. When I proceeded to leave after I got my payment processed, I believe the manager of the poor establishment made a comment to one of her employees and said “why she looking at me like that “? And I responded by saying who ? She proceeded by saying  “why you looking at me like that “? I responded by saying ,” you looking at me , we made eye contact , I am not looking at you any kind of way calm down” The manager needs to learn some professionalism, even if I was looking at you some type of way why would you say that to an employee? It’s a shame that I cannot even go back to this location because of how I was treated today. The two employees should
Be a shame of themselves. FIND ANOTHER DAY JOB!!!

name: Siah’s World
text: Terrible experience at this store. Stopped here because the one in my location had nobody inside to help when I was leaving out, so I decided I would just stop at this one while I was in the area. First guy I spoke to, didn’t even attempt to help me, just pointed me to a table with stuff to package the boxes on it. Okay, fine. It was obvious I was having trouble, and nobody asked to help, AT ALL. So apparently I used the wrong tape, and didn’t know until it was sealed on the box already. So I ended up grabbing another to fix the issue. Again, fine right? I guess not. I let them know I wasn’t use to doing this, because the lady in my hometown store is always eager to help me! I hand her what I’m shipping out, and the label, and she takes care of the rest! Wonderful experience and convenient and time saving for me. The three employees here had no interest in assisting me, and then told me I would have to pay for the extra box that I messed up. Horrible customer service.

name: Diane Harris
text:
Horrible, HORRIBLE customer service from this post office.  The man with the long unkempt beard is rude and very unhelpful. I cringe when I walk inside and he's working.  The other employees are at least friendly.  There is at least one lady (my husband described her as the one with the accent)  who obviously has no clue how to do her job. As an Avon representative, I  have a dedicated mailing list where I ship out approximately 25 brochures to my customers every two weeks.  Occasionally, I will include a small vial of a perfume sample.  I have been doing this for over a year and have never,  ever had a problem....until today. My husband went to the post office to mail this weeks shipment and the "lady with the accent" told him he couldn't mail them  because of the perfume vial. According to the  USPS website it states the following---Perfume containing alcohol may not be shipped internationally or mailed domestically using air transportation. PERFUME CONTAINING ALCOHOL,  HOWEVER,  MAY BE SHIPPED WITHIN THE UNITED STATES BY GROUND TRANSPORTATION.
Please, PLEASE  educate your employees.  I shouldn't have to tell your employees how to do their job. If I  had gone to the post office instead of sending my husband to mail the packets, I can guarantee you that they most definitely would have been mailed. When I know what I'm talking about and know it to be fact I WILL NOT back down from an employee who is obviously clueless! You can do better than this!!

name: Richard Danner
text: paid for ovetnite delivery on priorty mail...never got there...norecord on fielof the number i was given by the guy with the long beard

name: Natalie Moore
text: Shouts out to Craig & April. Post Office work takes a special kind of customer service chutzpah.

name: Sonja Ward
text: No wait, No line, I mailed my daughter a care package from home to California,(Valentine's) I colored hearts and they was wiping off, the employee found a red  marker(permanent) and said he would color a few hearts and decorate the outside for me. Just the special touch it needed.

name: Matthew Emigh
text: Very upset.  I needed to ship a package today, and pick up a certified letter.  When I arrived at the office (which is supposed to close at 5) I found a handwritten sign on the window that said they closed at 12.  Not cool.  The staff is normally not the nicest in the world, and now they just only open when they feel like it.  Very upset.  Figures though; government organization.

name: Betsy C Cooper
text: There is only one person up front, With 12 people waiting in line. she’s trying her best, But where is everyone else ??? I see a bunch of cars everywhere but only one person ???? Please be better for our safely !

name: Katie Lambert
text: I just moved out of my apartment in January about an hour away. I had 2 Keys and turned in one the day I moved out and my dad came to the oxford post office to mail the other key. They put it in a special padded package so it wouldn’t get damaged in processing, & he paid about $8 to mail it. They specified that he needed to put a return address in case it got lost in shipping. My apartment called and never received it and charged me $17 for a missing key when we mailed it January 30, 2020!! Thanks, oxford USPS, for charging my dad $8 and then now also I owe $17 extra for not having the key turned in like it was supposed to and they had to change the locks. I really appreciate that!!!!😡

name: Paige Core
text:
I have called and called the local office to speak to the Postmaster regarding the carrier that delivers my mail.
EVERYDAY I come my box  lid is open and my mail has fallen out onto the ground, or gotten wet depending on the weather.
I hope this review will sanction a conversation to all of the carriers on their mail efficiency.

name: Sarah Lewis
text: They are always so helpful when you go in to mail packages. Help you get the best deal and are the nicest government employees I've ever come across. I go out of my way to go to this post office because they are so helpful and pleasant

name: Bridget Baltes
text: I order alot of things online. I was expecting a big package. I never heard anyone Knock on the door. But yet they left a card in my mail box saying my package is a large box. They missed me and they'll try again tomorrow. I waited for several hours the next day. I constantly checked out the window to see if anyone pulled up. No one did,and I didn't even get another card from them. Saying they still have it and for me to pick it up.

name: Kadesha Spence
text: I called multiple times and when they finally answered no one said any thing. Then when I called back they had the phone off the hook.

name: James Matthews
text: Closed during posted operating hours..

name: Kathy Sweatmon
text: We have a wonderful mailman,  always very sweet. I don’t know his name but he is awesome.  Everyone please remember that just like us they are human and so make mistakes.

name: Lillian Bowers
text: These 5 stars are going to Ms. Capsey! I've been having some delivery issues and she personally came to my house and delivered my packages! I was baffled and extremely appreciative. My mom had neck surgery and can do very little so we couldn't always go get the packages from the office. Thank you so much!!

name: Tori Francis
text: My normal mail carrier is AWESOME. She’s super sweet and always great. However any time I have to deal with the customer service at the actual post office location it is horrible. I’ve recently fractured my ankle. I had ordered a walking boot and it shipped from Atlanta to Cullman. Then for some reason they sent it BACK to Georgia and it got returned to Cullman but when I called asking for assistance wondering where it is (bc it’s an emergency, I need it for mobility) they at first just told me to keep checking my tracking and when I informed them the tracking said it was in their possession they “looked” for it and said they would contact the carrier and get back in touch with me. I called after an hour and the worker was short with me. I tried to be understanding but it’s frustrating when no one seems to actually want to help.

name: Nicole Crook
text: Get others people’s mail all the time. I’ve had packages lost. I always select “Leave package on the porch” because I have mobility issues and CANT make it down to my mailbox to get stuff out of it sometimes. NONE of my packages are ever left on the porch unless they are too big to fit in the mailbox.

name: Misty Wadsworth
text:
I love my normal carrier! He's the best and when he isn't on my route, the lady that fills in is great.  However, there is a couple of others that fill in that are rude and just plain dumb!
When they are working, my packages aren't delivered to my address. They are going elsewhere and then LOST!

name: Miranda Evans
text: Always making sure i have what i need and came for thanks guys

name: nancy eagan
text: Half the time we don’t get our mail from cullman post office. If our regular mailman is not working. For some reason. The stuff in cullman doesn’t care and is very rude people who work in the front office

name: wade graff
text: They leave me a note that says sorry we missed you please come down and pick up your letter at post office. I'm sorry I have a problem with that,for one you didn't miss me you never even knocked on my door or came on the property, so I will not go down to the post office you will do your job and bring me my letter to my door like you're supposed to. I'm Here 7days week

name: Christine Jones
text: From my experience these people go above and beyond for our community. I’ve had nothing but positive interactions with them.

name: Jack Mihoff
text: Customer service was of absolutely no use.

name: mtp04987
text: The post office must require their employees to have zero personality or customer service skills. I sent my niece with an envelope to the post office they said she could not send it in the envelope that it was in. They did not offer her a new envelope they did not offer to help in anyway; she didn’t know what to do so she came home. The people there are absolutely useless. I would not trust them to walk my dog.

name: Anne Middleton
text: Hate that we only get it 2 to 3 times a week. Today seen mail truck at end of road but never made it.

name: Chad Thompson
text: Our mail carrier is the best. Very kind and also gives our dogs treats every time she delivers.

name: Christine Albert
text: This is the worst Post Office I have ever dealt with, cannot get packages delivered. Lost packages on multiple occasions. I don’t buy a product for it to be delivered Wrong or stolen by my mail carrier.

name: Michelle Emigh
text: Our street has been closed recently due to repairs and we have been unable to receive our mail. When I contacted the post office, Lonnie was so kind and made sure that I was able to get the deliveries that I had been waiting for. He contacted the driver to find out if they were on the mail vehicle, made arrangements for me to pick them up if needed, and called me the next day to make sure that I had received them. Excellent customer service!

name: Chris Foster
text: I had a notice in my box stating that my package would be available for pick-up the following day. When I arrive at the office they are unable to find my package. They told me they would contact the driver and get back with me. 3 days later they had not gotten back with me so I go back to the post office to be told they don't know who the driver was for my location on that day and there was nothing else they could do. How can not know who the driver was? Do they not keep any records?

name: Jayne Norman
text: Trying to call to ask a simple question is a JOKE.  My wait time would've been over an hour.  Guess I'll use a different service.

name: Kaye Walker
text: We moved here two years ago and still receive mail for the previous owner, including a check from the IRS!  We personally took it to the post office yesterday and like a boomerang,  it showed up in our box today.  We told the staff again to stop delivering other people's mail.  We have left the required form in our mailbox multiple times but nothing changes.   You can't even call your local PO, as only a toll free number is available.   No wonder it's bleeding money as they are soooooo incompetent!

name: Dale Powell
text: If you want any delivery on time or dropped off at your house at all just use UPS or FedEx.

name: Brandy Vincent
text: This place has HORRIBLE customer service. The manager walked away as i was trying to find my LOST package. Amazon says it's there yet they say is hasn't even been shipped! I asked to be directed to someone who could help me and she walked away! Seems you can't get good service anywhere in Cullman!!! Extremely disappointed!

name: Blenda Williams
text:
Mail carrier's for Vegil Village Court southwest does not deliver mail properly
Mailcarrier only delivers when they choose to

name: Shawn Jones
text: The mail person keeps marking packages as not delivered no access, my mailbox is outside by the road by the other 25 apartments mailboxes they are just being lazy now or something. I am getting tired of my mail going missing and packages not getting delivered for absolutely no reason.

name: Shawna Ayers
text: Literally the WORST past office in Alabama. The mail carriers are the laziest employees on the planet. Do yourself a favor and use UPS or FEDEX for packages.

name: Michele S
text: Package was marked as undeliverable, apparently the carrier was too lazy to drop it at the door.

name: Corrie Stiverson
text: I was treated terrible when I came to pick up a package that had been sitting in their office for two weeks that was suppose to be delivered. Carrier says mailbox was full.... Never once has my mailbox been full. I head been looking for the other daily. I tried shaking with the manager over there matter and he says if I have a problem to go online and report it but as of right but he can have it where I have to pick up every piece of mail I get from the post office. Very bad service and can't seem to get my mail. What to do from here I have no idea.,

name: Jessica Hames-Penner
text: My packages were incorrectly sent back and marked as undeliverable.

name: Skye
text: Been up there twice in the past week, and the first time a regular employee was rude to me. The past time, the regular employee was nice, but I spoke to the supervisor and she was extremely rude.

name: Kevin Williams
text: Rarely receive my mail, I get it maybe twice a week, but I do get it once when I get the sells papers. They need to do a better job and hire more employee's to deliver the mail. I live a mile from the Post Office and it's still this bad they have no excuse I live in the City limits.

name: Naomi Womack
text:
Please  do something  about your mail people,   they only deliver in the Cullman housing when they want to.
The skip delivery here all the time.
And they deliver packages to wrong addresses 😠😠😠😠   train your people!!!!!
I want my packages.    Is that so dam hard????       I don't thing your people try hard enough . They in a hurry to go home.😠

name: Jason Leonard
text: I ordered an item using 3 day shipping. It is now 5 days to waiting and I just found out that the delivery is "pending". It's been in the post office for 3 days and they won't deliver it. I even went in to the office and they said there was nothing they could do. I suppose walking to the back, getting my package and handing it to me is over their pay grade.

name: Mary Latham
text: They keep losing my packages and won’t do nothing but be hateful when trying to resolve it! One package showed up weeks later and had been held by them for no reason then the next one just disappeared...

name: Bruce Bentley
text: Had graduation pictures sent to my P.O. box. They were bent with a bend, crease in the 8x10s. I called they blamed it on the ones who sent me the pictures. REALLY

name: Michael Martin
text: I think these reviews are funny

name: Brenda Holmes
text: Poor mail service. Letters in mail box with flag up. Mail wasn't picked up. Ct rd 1467.

name: Buba Gump
text: I had 3 seperate packages coming from Amazon. The first package was marked delivered and sent back to the post office with the failed delivery attempt. The other two were returned because the carrier was too lazy to write a slip or drop it on the door 50 feet away.

name: Randy McKinney
text:
Extremely disappointed in 1.  Not knowing day to day who's delivering
2.  Going times without any delivery
We will see today is 1 Dec. 18 and show pkgs out for delivery....it is now 1645 hrs and we normally get Saturday mail at Noon or so??

After reading all the comments it seems time for The Post Master General to look into all the problems at this particular P.O.

name: 2ndchance
text: Well today I hadn't received my mail by 4pm(usually have it by 9am)  so I called the post office, they ensured me that since it was out for delivery that it WOULD be delivered today no matter what. That was a lie ,they were too lazy to come by here at all.

name: Heather Hollis
text: Terrible customer service!

name: Joe Panchoo

name: Brenna C
text: Apparently having your mailbox flag up for two days doesn't mean anything. Lazy mail carriers around here. Guess having things delivered on time means nothing to the USPS.

text: If the customer line is long before 1pm, Be careful. They will let you leave the post office for their lunch. You have to come back again.

name: Krissy Cinnamon
text: The ladies here are always kind and friendly. I’ve been going here for years and highly prefer it over the Forestdale location. The only part is remembering that they close for lunch and I always end up going at the wrong time. I still highly recommend this location!

name: don hoskins
text: small  post office.the people there are friendly and  do a great job

name: fat mama's lunchbox
text: Its a small post office but they get the job done

name: Luis Rivera
text: The aplication some package for my home dont take a paper in my mail box for go to pick up in the postal office they take to somebody.in the office of the apartment .and me i don't now were its my package the its legal for a postal service.

name: Natalie Strickland
text: This is worst post office ever they are very very disrespectful and I don't receive none of my mail and never received mail in my p.o box like I suppose to. This post office need to be shut down!!!!!

name: Jesse Romine
text: Not sure why, but this hub will continually mark packages delivered that were not, or they will “attempt to deliver” but say they couldn’t get in or something. They will say no one was there to get the package when I have it shipped to a location that always has someone at the reception area. I have at least 5-10 packages shipped every month via USPS and I constantly have to go here to clear up issues. They have done it with a patio umbrella, cell phone, tube of silicone lube for o rings, shoes, and more.  Usually not one to complain because I know USPS is underfunded, but something really needs to get done about this garbage.

name: Cassi Cummings
text: Worst post office I’ve ever had. I go out of my way to use fedex and ups as much as possible, even when it costs more, because this office cannot be trusted to deliver anything. Almost every month I have to file complaints, most of which are never followed up on. No one answers the phone at the local office. Carrier doesn’t attempt delivering packages.

name: Tina Hawkins
text: Why does the mail lady feel the need to urinate on the side of the road every time she drops off the mail. There is a gas station less than half a mile with a restroom. This is disgusting and unprofessional.

name: T Massive
text: Terrible they've marked 3 of my packages as delivered this year and no where to be found. 2 of them happening to be pretty expensive. Thanks for your lack of attention.

name: Patricia Mabe
text: Can't never talk to anyone that works this post office and I have never said to hold my mail at the post office.... Poor customer service at this post office......

name: Sydni Meade
text: Who could we speak to besides this post office because I’m having a feeling someone not doing their job to deliver these mail. That it says that it’s coming but not and don’t blame it on the COVID because why have a picture of my mail and still not deliver it I’ve have not received more than 20 mails since I moved here.

name: MCP
text: Lost tons of my packages, has no idea where any of them are. ABSOLUTELY livid. Don't waste your time going here.

name: Annahk Anna
text: They pick up my packages from my house, but scanned and sent only after 5 days! My packages been laying at their post office for 5 days, terrible!

name: Anyelinn Mireles
text: They don’t even answer my calls

name: Grim The-Celt
text: A gentleman named Larry helped me out. Was very clear and straight to the point.  Probably only the second time to the post office and it made it painless. Went on Saturday near close time and no line, so I lucked out there. I will say the building blends in and I missed it first time by. That's a user error though.

name: Michael Young
text: Yeah I was just trying to find out what a post office box cost cuz I needed one and believe it or not it is a typical impossible I mean I hit every number I called it five times and went through every menu number and didn't get anything that is why I'm giving y'all just terrible reviews

name: Ed Czerniewski
text: This post office practices deception and discrimination. They skip deliveries to HUB zone addresses and lie on tracking saying that there was no access. Security camera proves that there was no delivery attempt.

name: dennis keim
text: This my favorite store to visit - always very friendly, courteous and extremely helpful!

name: Kelcie Oldani
text: This was my second time visiting this location and may I say this will be the last time. I dealt with Lary both times and both times he was extremely rude. I also witnessed him being disrespectful to another customer while I was there. This time I went, I went up to the counter because I needed my mail to be held. When I told him that his response in a very hateful tone was "why". He continued to dig into my business with snarky remarks. Needless to say he was asking questions that were none of his business the entire time in a very angry tone. His customer service skills are absolutely terrible.

name: Chris Day
text: This is one of the oldest post offices in Huntsville Alabama. They have a very reliable staff that has been with the post office for many many years. I would highly recommend this post office to anyone.

name: Caitlyn Wiseman
text: I get more mail for people who don't live at my home then I do for members of my family. Even with complaints, there is no change. Why are we paying postal workers so that we can do their job for them? I have to make weekly trips to the post office to have mail returned or forwarded. Unacceptable. No wonder people don't send letters anymore.

name: Jay Dub
text: Edited review: (from1star to 4) due to fantastic customer service given by the supervisor named Sharon who was extremely quick to resolve my issue and was extremely courteous! - thank you for you professionalism!

name: Mike n Micki
text: Went there this morning to send a package n to inquire about the status of my husband's package that had been shipped. The postal worker I had to deal with this morning was very rude n acted like he didn't want to be at work. I will not be going back to this post office, even if it's the closest one to where I live at. Highly recommend going to another post office.

name: Penny Vidler
text:
We have had issues with our mail delivery since our former carrier left about a year ago, we are a business on Bob Wallace Ave. and we have not received or had mail picked up in two days, and there is never a day that goes by without us receiving something, so where is our carrier and our mail. I will have to take our mail and drop it off because it needs to be mailed today !!! The mail service is just getting so very bad !!!!
PV

name: Rachael Loper
text: My experience with one worker there is the reason for this negative review. An older white male (sounds like the man a few other people have described) didn't acknowledge I was there so I say hello first. He then mumbles something and I couldn't understand what he was saying and I asked him to repeat himself twice. He then asked me very rudely if I spoke English (since I couldn't understand his mumbles). I was like ummmm, yes. He replied with "well you're my first one I've had today." I was so shocked he would even talk about that in his work setting but I replied with "well, there's nothing wrong with a little diversity." His reply- "that's what makes a nation commit suicide." I said sarcastically "it sounds like you're having a great day" and he replied sarcastically "oh yeah." It was one of the strangest, rudest interactions I've ever had with someone and he sounds like a very negative person.

name: Aubree Dreher
text: Said my package was delivered but I never received it went to office and talked to manager said she would call me when the driver got back because she couldn't get ahold of him and she never called

name: Amber Schmidt
text: Put a package in my mailbox that was too big. Messed it up being it out

name: Jessica Reynolds
text: I was completely taken by surprise with the disrespectful attitude of the employee who processed my transaction. I didn't tape up my package which was usual, as other usps offices always are kind to help and offer help when needed. This guy however decided to say to me that "everyone expects everything for free" "We don't provide you with tape, so when this is gone you'll have to get your own free tape" as he proceeded to slam my box several times. I'm assuming he slammed the box because I was not saying a word back. I was actually too surprised I was getting treated the way I was. When he finished my transaction he handed me the receipt and I said "thank you" of course he doesn't acknowledge the fact that I even exist. Totally unacceptable, but this will never get taken seriously, and he will go on being rude to guests. I would advise you go to the location off of Wynn. Dr. Description: Short, white, male, wearing hat, in late 50's.

name: Adriana Noble
text: Great experience on multiple occasions!

name: poochyena
text: They continually forget to pick up packages from my house that I schedule. Has happened multiple times this year.

name: Queen Bee
text: Rude. Guy at counter who helped me and did not say thank you cat, dog, or otherwise. I tried smiling but he just sling my receipt and mumbled here ya go. His old butt needs to retire

name: Robin Lynn
text: They Say they Attempted delivery Twice and left a note but No note and I was home both days. My dogs didn't bark and no knock or doorbell ring. Now it's missing

name: Matthew “Matt S”
text: great for drop offs

name: Olajide jaiye-williams
text: Very efficient.

name: anthony is boss
text: Araraaatw

name: La'Chae Hammonds
text: I don't ever get what I'm suppose to get on the days it supposed to be delivered. They never answer the phone and when they do they have such nasty attitudes. How can I get my mail because at this point it's ridiculous.

name: Lanore Smith
text: Everyone at this branch is nice and helpful.

name: Deborah Phillips
text: I had them to hold my mail for a few days and one of the ladies is so rude to me. When I ask her for my mail she always says that there isn't any today without even looking to see.

name: Nikki H
text: I live in Ashland and sadly this post office has caused several issues for me returning important mail after being listed as "moved with no return address" which I hadn't. The employees at the counter are usually friendly and very helpful. I have forwarded all my mail to the PO box from now on and I guess eventually it will be recognized as forwarded.

name: Bonnie Q. Calihua
text: Great place. Long time employees. Got passports  with mo issues.

name: shannon higgins
text: Was in twice in the last week, rudest employees I’ve ever had to deal with.

name: Joe Thomas
text: I've never had a problem at the Rainsville post office. Always there to help you with a late package.

name: Kay Fortner
text:
With respect to the postal workers, I'd like to share this old poem.
"Ode to a Conductor"
Mine is not to run this train, the whistle I cannot blow
Mine is not to say just how far this train will go
I am not allowed to blow off steam or even ring the bell
But let this train run off the tracks, and see who catches hell
- Author unknown

name: Stephanie Smith
text: LOVE this post office!  I ship daily for my work from home business, and everyone is so friendly and helpful.  My husband and I were talking about moving, but this post office is one of the reasons why I want to stay right here.  Can't bear the thought of leaving them and their service.  =)

name: Marie Fortner
text: Apparently the mail carriers are incompetent and cannot get my mail in the appropriate box. This is a reoccurring problem here. I have lived in several rural towns and never had a problem with service. I live in apartments and no there is nothing blocking causing a hazard or dogs chasing her off. She just can't get it right it has been MONTHS of this. So Everytime this happens I have to wait for whoever receives my mail to check their mail and return it. If they even do return it. Good thing I have informed delivery.

name: chevy3girl
text: Never get our correct mail. Don't expect your packages or regular mail delivered to the correct address.

name: Derick Thorn
text: This is the worst post office I've ever visited. The stuff knows NOTHING, as a customer I know more about international shipping then them and they still think they can be rude to you. I was there on Friday 8th of February 2.30 pm. I do hope that Corp will do something about those two who were working there. I will never put my foot there again!! They might check Fyffe post office how customer service should work.

name: rayeann Helms
text: Very rude I'm hearing imparied and hard to read lips when you are at a desk

name: Jay Copeland
text: Efficient and helpful.

text: I highly recommend Julie Davis. She has worked very hard for both myself and my partner!

text: Actually not a good bank for business accounts. Overly restrictive.

name: Renee Dobbs
text: Terrible customer service, highly recommend banking elsewhere.

name: Danielle Sheppard
text: We had great service until we started having packages come up missing or not delivered to the correct house, the manager wanted to make up every excuse in the book even to the point that GPS takes them to the neighbor house down the road even though GPS leads straight into my driveway. we have a new delivery person as well and I feel she is very lazy. I’m a stay at home mom so I’m at home all day most days and she is to lazy to come to the door when a package has to be signed for instead she leaves the note that she missed us like we weren’t home in the mail box didn’t even bother coming to the door. This was today on a Saturday morning I was home and she didn’t even bother knocking on the door or coming up to the house. My guess is last day of work she wanted to get done to go home ASAP. I know she didn’t bother coming to the door or up to the house because I saw her from the window deliver the mail in the mail box and leave. Very poor poor work on her part.

name: Becky Redden
text: Personal was very helpful and happy to help me. I was delighted with the service!!!!

name: Freda Gray
text: We try to help everyone and treat everybody the same.

name: Shamaron McPherson
text: Mail has been sitting since August 12 with tracking at Helena. Called today and lady said it wasn't there. I called the 1800 USPS NUMBER and they said it was there IN HELENA. So where is my package. I have 3 more with tracking and its no where to be found. I had a case search opened up 2 months ago for a 60. Dollar card and no one ever contacted me or anything.  I CALLED POST OFFICE AND SOMEONE SAID A EMPLOYEE WAS SICK AND WOULD CALL ME BACK. GUESS WHAT NO ONE CALLED ME BACK. STILL TO THIS DAY NO ONE CAN TELL ME WHERE IT IS .

name: Michael Harris
text: Nikita that works the front counter is the reason I gave 5 stars. Everytime I go in she is always professional, courteous, and has a positive attitude. That's a pretty big accomplishment considering some of the 1 star customers I've seen her deal with.

name: Rush Videos
text: Tried to go there today and black gentleman was screaming at everyone to close the doors. Think employees need to understand it’s Christmas and just serve people and quit worrying about the doors. The line was out to the sidewalk and poor lady on walker was cold.

name: Jon Woodward
text: I have not gotten any mail in 8 days. This has been going on for 5 years and Helena. I've opened multiple cases through the post office website Pelham talk to a postmaster general three times over the last five years. it cannot be this hard to get mail delivery down they used to do it with no problem in the '60s and '70s and '80s

name: Jason Phillips
text: Slowest people I've ever seen. Plus cant even get the right mail in the right box.

name: Emilia Heart
text: Usually my packages come on time but lately my whole family has been having problems. It’s either mail we ship doesn’t deliver, or packages we ordered don’t come. The only way the packages actually get where they need to be is when we actually have to make a special trip to the post office to sort it out, and even then it takes a while for the mail to get to it’s destination. Whenever you try to call the post office to sort it out you have to spend a while on the phone with confusing recordings, and then on top of that you never even speak to another human. They should do something to fix this, and they should quit having all these confusing recordings, and just have an actual human answer the calls. If someone actually answered the calls instead of a recording, it would save people a lot of wasted time and confusion. Another problem we’ve had constantly is packages being delivered to our house that aren’t ours, and then we have to deliver them to the person they were meant to go to. The only reason I’m giving this post office a two star rating, is because of the excellent work they’ve done in the past. They need to fix whatever is going on, because I definitely never have to deal with anything like this when I’m getting packages from amazon or ups. Step up your game post office, and actually deliver the correct mail to the correct person on time.

name: Della Queen
text: everyone is very nice  and helpful

name: Daniel Teal
text: I love the post office.

name: April Phillips
text: There's not an option for zero stars!  I told the representative, Jayce, clerk #5, that I needed a shipping method that would confirm delivery of a package I was returning to China for a credit.  Well, he sold me a shipping method that didn't.  The recipient hasn't confirmed delivery, so I lost $250.00. Know exactly what you need before you step foot in this place.  Later post:  another incident has taken place; they failed to deliver my mail to me as well.

text: The service here is impeccable. Very nice people and they don't mind helping you. I have a PO Box here and I'm very happy with it. Keep up the good work and I highly recommend their service.

text: AMAZING people work there

name: Alley
text: Friendly, fast and knowledgeable staff.   One way drive in toward the far north side with a one way out beside it also on the north side of the building.  Parking is located on the north side of the building.  Outside Drop box located on the north side at the drive to the left toward the end of the parking lot. The lobby entrance is facing 231/431. Supplies looked well stocked.

name: Morgan Ekdahl
text: Please stop laying on your horn and just beeping your constantly. I have a new born and can’t always come to the door or even move when you beep. And don’t leave my packages in the middle of drive way either...... 🤨

name: Samantha Bailey
text: Mail never comes at the same time. Mail is never delivered to the right mail box. And when reported the postmaster laughed at me!!! And had the audacity to question the condition of my mailbox. Absolutely terrible service terrible postmaster!

name: jess mathis
text:
Not being able to talk to someone AT this specific post office whenever I call is such a pain.

However, when we first moved to our current house both guys that ran our route stopped to introduce themselves. That was pretty great ! I like the feel of this small town Post Office. Sometimes I feel like the hours are odd, but as long as they update their info on Google and continue being quick and nice, I don't see a big issue with them. Our carriers (one is Rick) are super friendly and nice!

name: Kelly Steinke
text:
Hazel Green, AL Post office

Our mail gets delivered at times from two house to blocks down the street.

I was to have two packages delivered on same day. One came to me but then right after I get an email and text saying Not delivered, unable to locate address. WAIT WHAT!? I just recieved one package to that same "unable to locate address".

Often get regular mail days after we were to receive it OR we just get it.

What is the problem!!!!!? Hire capable people and/or a Manager that has it together.

name: J C
text: Good customer service.

name: Johnny Cooper
text: It's pathetic to be unable to even talk to your LOCAL. Post.

name: Sadie Mae
text: Noah is super friendly. I always hope and pray here's there when I walk through the door. There's another woman, not sure of her name, but she's so off-putting. Just snippy, like she hates her job.

name: Deborah M
text: What is the point of this place? It is NEVER open, no matter when you stop by. How much money is being wasted on rent in this location? Just shut it down already. It's infuriating to see the hours on the door and yet never have anyone there. Unreal.

name: Linda Pierre
text:
I've lived in Bluff Park for 20 years and have always appreciated having this post office so close! The Vestavia and Hoover post office are extremely busy!
No, they are not perfect. But in general they do a good job!

name: Brian Gronewold
text: Inconsistent staffing. You cannot rely on the facility to be open during posted hours of normal operation.

name: J E
text: 5 Star to 1 star.  Update. 11/12/20 it appears they have to close for A LUNCH BREAK!!. Whenever they feel like it! This is sad, so many people trying to mail packages... just a sign on the inside door "Out  to lunch "!! No time frame!! Seriously!

name: Kam Wall
text: If I could give this place zero stars, I would. Your employees are very rude, lack common courtesy & does not have the communication skills to be working for the USPS post office. I will be getting the information of the young lady who answered the phone "OH MY GOD" before speaking to me.

name: VictorAlexSaavedra
text: They’ve been on “lunch break” for 2 hours. Standing in line with 6 other people waiting for them to get back. What a joke of a place.

name: Linda Brady
text: They won't even answer the phone. Mail is sent back for me to pick up..for no reason. Ridiculous

name: Edward Cole
text: This location only takes debit, credit, and checks for payment. This is a problem when you need a money order and can only pay with cash.

name: Karen Turpin
text: I honestly should not have even given one star.  I have lived in Bluff Park over 12 years and try to make it a point to never come here.  The sweetest little community with the WORST post office ever.  If you are going to work in a job where you communicate with people, either do it in a polite way or get another job.  Be rude to me...that’s bad enough; however, to be rude to my 6 year old - is pretty pathetic.  Oh well, guess it’s a good early life lesson to my kids that people who work at this post office always have been and always will be RUDE!!!!!!!!!!!!

name: Kasey Davis
text: Not worthy of even a single star. Postal delivery persons vary and are inconsistent in delivering or picking up mail. We had outgoing mail in our exterior box with the flag up for 3 days this week and postal person never took it and today actually just lowered the flag without taking the mail but placed incoming mail in the lower portion of the box... We also often receive other people's mail who aren't even in the same area.

name: The Dream Peddlery by J.Nisbet-Hoyle
text: This is THE WORST usps post office that I have EVER been to. The ladies that sit, (yes, SIT. Most postal employees stand and move) behind the counter are RUDE, unfriendly and act constantly exasperated. They don't like answering questions. They don't want to take the second it takes to print out a receipt for pre-paid packages. It's really quite amazing that the management lets them work there. The scanners don't scan and they tell you it's your fault. I'll do anything not to have to go into this post office. Thank goodness for the scheduled pick up that USPS offers. If I have to go to the post office I will drive a few miles further and get excellent service with scanners and employees that do a good job. DO NOT WASTE YOUR TIME WITH THIS ONE!!!!

name: Jennifer Metcalf Rigg
text: I WILL NEVER USE THE P.O. AT SJADES MTN PLAZA AGAIN AND I WILL BE SURE EVERYONE I KNOW WILL NOT AS WELL. On 11/14/16 the employee working that day was the rudest person ever who should NOT be working customer service. NOT only was when talking to me like I was a complete idiot, BUT what was so disturbing to cause me to take time out of my day to write a review was an elderly lady came in behind me she could barely walk had a kane from her obvious scoliosis stepped close to the stamp display case to SEE stamps and the employee RUDELY TOLD HER TO GET BACK BEHIND THE LINE! The poor lady looked scared too death and walked out and so did I. Pray for the lady who works there as well, she obviously needs Jesus!

name: Priscilla Perez
text:
Went in today to drop off a pre-paid package and the lady told me she could not ship it because my label had a date (July 23, the day the item that was purchased), and said it was too late and that I was going to have to print out another label that's more recent. I told her that was the date the item was purchased and that I've never had a problem shipping my packages 6 days later.

I don't have the convenience of a printer at home so I wasn't able to print the label until the 25th while at school, and have not been able to get to the post office until today (29th), and now she tells me I won't be able to ship my package AND I have to print another label???

I had to waste more gas and drive to another location to drop off my package. Do not go to this post office, this lady will profile you and be rude and uphelful if she doesn't like something about you.

For the record, I took my package straight to The Hoover Mail Center by the Sunoco gas station on 31 and they had no problem with my package!

name: Mike Williams
text: This place SUCKS DONT STOP HERE IT SUCKS BAD #SUCKIEST POST OFFICE EVER!!!"

name: Kelly Daniel
text: Rude and not at all helpful! I don't think answering a phone call is so terrible that you need to begin the call by yelling at a customer.... maybe that's just me!

name: Ghost Guy
text: horrible service. slow and un friendly. i called to inquire about a package i missed the delivery of and the rude lady hung up on me.

name: Michael Hesse
text: Solar glasses sent for eclipse on Thursday. Eclipse on Monday. Glasses received Tuesday. Only going to Huntsville from this location. Can't give a negative on Google unfortunately.

name: Garrett Monge
text: Very slow & unfriendly service.  This place is horrible.

name: Kayla Wainwright
text: Kind people work here. Quick.

name: Randal DeFoe
text: Great group of postal workers very friendly and helpful

name: Lila Wild
text: Nice very SMALL country post office. We got our passport applications and photos done here.

name: Jonathan Bain
text: I picked up a money order the other day and they helped me in understanding how it works purchasing, completing and tracking it.  I sent two items today, a package and a letter, Express mail and the person helped me in getting everything correct for shipment and delivery.  It seems to me like they have pretty good customer service being very helpful and courteous both times.

name: Megan Keno
text: Automation says package delivered to my box. No it is not. I want my package. Why is it no person answers a phone just a crazy automated voice that does not give you the information you want. Why all the garbage about COVID  get over it.

name: Latrice Walker
text: I don’t think the mailman can read! Half the time we get other people mail or our mail end up in their mailbox. And I was supposed to received a package Saturday. Never got it! It said it was delivered so where the heck is it?

name: Ckss Bush
text:
My first time at this location and was an awful experience. The guy working there needs to not work with the public he is very rude and not helpful at all.
Come on Postal Service set standards and hold your employees liable ... DO BETTER

name: Katherine s
text: I have always had a good experience doing business at this post office. Anytime I have had any issues with deliveries the staff have been very cooperative and sincerely concerned with resolving the problem. Right now there seems to be some confusion with deliveries to my address due to the city transitioning residents from numbered lee road addresses to street addresses with names. I hope this will be resolved soon as I do a lot of online shopping.

name: christopher yingling
text: First off I didn’t appreciate being profiled when I came in to this post office to do a money order transaction. The woman in the back who started to make up that emails came in saying that everyone has to be carded for making a money order transactions. Even tho both employees in the front said that wasn’t protocol with the amount I was getting. I just want to say thank you for profiling me because I have tattoos all over me. Guess if I was still wearing the uniform it wouldn’t have been an issue. Just know that your services at this post office will no longer be of use to me and my business.

name: randy hall
text: I have had no problems here. My daughter lives out of state so I ship often. They always give an accurate arrival date even during the holidays and their staff is great. Sometimes there is a long wait but it's a very small location with only 1 or 2 people working the counters but they are super friendly. Great experiences here

name: Gremblo Gremblo
text: Still waiting on my package that should have been here 3 days ago. No way to call and talk to somebody about it either.

name: Janelle Briscoe
text: What's the point of having a phone if you dont answer it?

name: James B
text: I have had several times the same problem others have stated. I'm home all the time and dont get my packages delivered. I get emails stating delivery attempted but that is complete BS. I even have security cams showing the driver never getting out of the car.

name: Matt
text: Still waiting on a package that should have been here 2 days ago. The customer service number tells you nothing besides they can’t help. And you think I’m gonna let you handle a mail in ballot for me???? 😆😆 heck no!!!

name: Debbie Elzey
text: The lady is the only.one that is nice. The younger guy is plain out smart talking to people . He has a unfriendly manner and does not need a job out front.

name: Thereal Mc
text: Mail left on ground, bent flag what customer service?

name: Shannon Pickard
text: Many delivery issues, and holding mail

name: joseph carman
text: Nice people, location can get crowded sometimes but they work as quickly as possible to get you in and out.

name: Reg Desousa
text: Friendly service :).Those people are wonderful in there they go above and beyond.

name: Linda Gill
text: We had to move our mail box bc FedEx Guy or UpS trucks kept backing over it..Since then The Man man is prissy about where we sat it up out of the way of our neighbors driveway. So needless to say he is holding our mail .I guess I will have to show my face at the post office .

name: Ko H
text: I needed a package delivered to my house and they left a note and DID NOT knock on the door. I didnt receive my package in time, eventhough they had it. Horrible.

name: Derek Hurst
text: I shipped a package to the Philippines on May 4th 2015 and paid $30 for 3 to 5 day delivery. Today is May 18th and it still has not arrived. I also sent another package to the same place in the Philippines on May 11th and paid $50 for a guarantee 3 day delivery. Again it is May 18th and this package has not arrived either. They both say in transit. I called to speak with the Post Master. They took my name and number and have not called me back since..... Not impressed at all.

name: Jay “Honeycomb” Holcomb
text: This NOT a real post office. It's a residential neighborhood which is a cul-de-sac.

name: Queen Gemini
text: These incompetent people lost my package from JustFab & then claiming that they're computers are down! Such bs! Not to mention they will put your mail in other people's mailbox. If you can't do your job correctly then you need to work somewhere else!

name: Volodymyr Dubinin
text: Good job!

name: Red See
text: This

name: Danny Thomas
text: I went to pick up my package that was to be delivery the next day and was told by MIKE I couldn’t because it had to be sorted. I have Been to others post office where they let me pick up my package if it was there. So what’s the problem? He could have easily reached behind him and handed me my item. Plus the attitude he had and tried to walk off when I was walking up. Luckily I was in a good mood..

name: April M.
text: The person delivering mail down Lott Rd has no clue what they're doing. There have been several occasions where i havent received important mail (concert tickets, physical items etc) because the mail person puts my mail in another persons box. Either that or putting other people's mail in mine.

name: Herlis Williams
text: Worked for po in h town for 21 lived here in Semmes for a year still having neighbor bring some of my mail. Unsatisfactory

name: MILO BROWN
text: Great staff. Friendly and knowledgeable. Always have, always will.

name: Juan Puente
text: Had a package get lost in transit (MEMPHIS DISTRIBUTION CENTER) but Matt went out the way to help me fill out a search for missing package form and had my package within a couple of days.! Thanks man!!

name: amber pierce
text: Always get friendly customer service and they are able to answer any questions I may have about shipping an item.

name: Charybdis ¿?
text: The customer service has really improved since I last visited! Very impressed.

name: karen McInnis
text: Ricky Long , the person over the Semmes Post Office is Rude, uncorpora,tive, unprofessional, and wants to show his authority, He has put lives in danger, He made us move our mailboxes to the road, from my parking lot where it has been for the last 20 years, safer for us and mail carrrier, he refused to listen, just wanted to show his authority .

name: Stacy Tillman Suddarth
text: Never helpful and rude.  I needed a box and got ZERO help

name: Twizty X
text: Operates exactly like a post office should.

name: Rafael M
text: Ok

name: BLAKE TIDWELL
text: They stated a package was undeliverable and the reason provided was "mailbox was full".  The package was a DESK.  I routinely have to pry packages out of the mailbox because they were crammed in to avoid getting out and leaving it on the porch.  I had to crush a box with plyers to get it out of the mailbox in one instance.  I get that they don't want to get out of the car to put something on the porch...but it is part of the job.

name: World’s Okayest Marine Grunt
text: They won’t deliver mail if cars are anywhere near the mailbox. Even 4-5 feet from the mailbox. It’s like they don’t want to have to put their vehicle in reverse after putting it in the box. Had a light sprinkle and he didn’t want to walk 8 feet to my porch to drop off my package. Chelsea USPS drivers are a joke. Lazy and don’t care about getting you your mail.

name: Melanie King
text: After 7 years they have decided they can't deliver packages because they "can't find my house" even though you can see my door from the street and the house numbers are on the house.

name: Bill Decker
text: No idea how I’m supposed to get my package, they have no weekend hours, only open until 4 during the week and my driver is apparently either too lazy or too stupid to drive up the hill. They can’t be reached directly by phone either. Very, very poor service.

name: Chris Monroe
text: They will not get out of the car to leave mail if they have to. They are building in our neighborhood and cars block our mailbox that have nothing to do with us and they won’t leave our mail those days. That’s not right.

name: Darryl Peterson
text: I've lived in Chelsea over twenty years and have had no major delivery issues and very few minor issues (a letter or two gets delivered next door by mistake).  The service has been consistent even as Chelsea has grown but the office has not.  Always pleasant and efficient when I need to go inside.  I miss having the drop off on the curve but it is a minor quibble.

name: stephen collins
text:
Carrier refuses to get out of the truck if it's raining. blames it on "animal interference" when they walk past the same little dog every other time they have to deliver a package, I have them on my security cameras, my dogs were nowhere near the truck... Just laziness.....

Update 2 months later. . I spoke to the nice lady behind the counter... I was told because there are dogs the carriers don't have to get out of the truck. So because my neighbors have dogs..... I can't get packages anymore..... I asked about a PO Box. One big enough for packages is 140 a year...... This is crappie....

name: Peter Young
text: I love the Chelsea Post Office!! Everyone is super nice and they are FAST!

name: Aaron Johnson
text: Postmaster here is very rude! They've lost at least $75 worth of items that are said to have been delivered but are no where to be found. When I asked the postmaster about it she asked me my address then pulled it up on Google maps on her phone and said that was we're were my package was. My mailbox isn't in the middle of the street!! Bunch of idiots work here!

name: Catherine “Best Friend” Marie
text: The people here are not very nice. If you do not like your job, find a new one. Being rude to customers is not the answer to your troubles.

name: Marissa Smith (JedidiahsWife)
text: Other than the fact that they close at 4:30 on weekdays, unlike the usual 5... the employees and facility are great.

name: Ryan Jones
text: Older location that serves its purposed. The post master at this location can be somewhat rude, and the staff have been known to be lazy and not get out of their vehicle to deliver your package to the door. Otherwise, they have never lost or destroyed any of my mail, so that is a plus.

name: S Taylor
text: Always in and out when I go here.

name: Sannae Hopson
text: Small with limited hours, but friendly, fast, and efficient

name: Steven Patterson (Realtor at eXp Realty)
text: I used to come here all the time to mail my packages, but I have not been here in almost a year. The service in general was slow, but the location was convenient. One of the postal workers refused to scan and accept my packages last December about two or three weeks before Christmas. She said I could put them in the bin outside the lobby. I left and have never been back. I took my packages to the downtown post office where they scanned and accepted them.

name: Corinna Bass
text:
This place is a nightmare for anyone looking for something as basic as a money order- how does a post office run out of money orders??
Also, make sure you have several different kinds of currency options because sometimes they can’t take cash, or sometimes their computer is down and can’t take cards. Everytime I’ve been in there, there is only one cashier- and there is always a line. Hey Post master, is this really a post office??

name: Mel M
text: The man at the counter is extremely rude to the point I am canceling my po Box.  They take weeks to deliver to the po Box and it's in the back the whole time but they refuse to look until days later.  I have had 2 encounters with the man at the front desk. The first time a package wasn't delivered and was a week past the confirmed delivery date he sent me away 3 times stating my package wasn't here and refused to go in the back.  Well it took 4 times and it was back there the whole time.  Today I go in with a tracking confirmation and he does the same thing and rudely tells me it's not here and again refused to even look at my tracking number.  So I have to wait another few weeks to get a package that in their back office again.  Seriously terrible service, rude for no reason.

name: Rachel McGuff
text: What an absolute joke. I had a package marked as delivered (it was not), and I followed the steps to open a case online. I received an email stating they would follow up with me and never did. Can’t get anyone on the phone, and my case has been marked as resolved. Glad to see my tax dollars going to great use

name: Aditi
text: had a package marked as delivered (it was not), and I followed the steps to open a case online. I received an email stating they would follow up with me and never did. Can’t get anyone on the phone,  this is so frustrating!!!!

name: Naomi Latture
text: We had a great experience here! The service was fast and the gentleman helping us was very kind to my daughter.

name: Elaine B
text: Rude, rude, rude. They’re not welcoming. You can come in and speak and say something as simple as, “Hello, how are you today?” and get no response or hello back from them. Once you’re done with your transaction, they basically just shoo you out of there. They no longer leave the prepaid label/package basket out for convenience instead of having to wait in line. You can go DURING business hours and the doors to the clerk window will be closed and locked. I went in yesterday and had a package with an incorrect label and the lady talked to me as if I was a child. I won’t be going back to this location.

name: Dina kamel
text: I will say the lady is efficient. Wants to get the job done but that it. There was no greetings of any kind, not even a smile. She Barely spoke. I would expect a better attitude especially in the times we’re in now. A smile goes a long way miss, might even makes your day go a bit faster, nicer and make someone day a little better! Kindness is free.

name: Bailee Isbell
text: Says they attempted to deliver my package but I’ve been at home all day and no one even showed up

name: Mary R (MJ)
text: I had to send a few things back to a sender, but the label wasn't valid anymore. the person at the counter helped me out and was still able to send it. No wait, thankfully. I do recommend this branch.

name: YakBurner
text: Pick up the dam phone

name: Demetrius Prince
text: They opens up @ 8:30 a.m. I stayed until 9 a.m. they still was not open!

name: Lesley Keith
text: All I asked was to have two envelopes hand stamped (mailing taxes) to show date/time and Lucinda said, "No, you need to put those in the box out there!" I know where to mail them....I needed them stamped. Never a problem at all of the others. 😑

name: Susan Jones
text: Very rude woman.  Not helpful on today's visit at 1120 am

name: Jim Eagle
text: They refused to deliver a package because they didnt feel like it.  The worst ever.  They need to be criminally investigated.

name: Sheivella Messick
text: They only pick up and deliver mail from green springs location when they wish! Not picking up my outgoing mail until they have mail for me. Some days don't even see them running my neighborhood. Exactly why I had to start paying my bills online!

name: Cristin Buentello
text: Was told my package was undeliverable.  I've lived at the address for a while and have received this particular package every month. Nothing has changed. I haven't received any mail that I'm suppose to receive  (I've signed up for informed delivery) I'm pretty sure it's a combination of they are too lazy to delivery it and they are stealing packages

name: Vanessa skripko
text: They stole my birthday present and when my aunt resent it they tried to steal that too. We had insurance on the second package thank God or we would have had 2 stolen packages. They never fixed the first problem but they were able to fix the second problem after 2 weeks of phone tag.

name: Tyler Volz
text: Unprofessional staff

name: Renee Page
text: Disrespectful, not well managed, inefficient and inconsiderate to customers.

name: Janet Kennedy
text:
First of all I would like to let you all know that this location is not the location that delivers your mail and packages.This location only does PO Boxes and they do a superb job in doing that and they also sell stamps and whatever needs you have on the counter .The  facility that you need to review is the one at Green Springs Carrier Facility at 285 Snow Drive .You're giving this location a very bad rating which it does not deserve
.

name: C Tyree
text: The racist employees of this location are rude and racist towards customers.   It’s close to my house so I went here a few times along with my spouse to ship a package or two.  What a sad experience.  Did I mention the employees here are racists?

name: Drea Denise
text: Just went here a few minutes ago, to see where my package was, because they didn’t leave a notice or anything. So when I get there, it takes me 15 minutes to be greeted. A man asked me the problem and I let him know I have moved and since my address has changed and my package was suppose to have been shipped to my old address before my mail got changed over and how they didn’t leave a notice. Now, he closes the door mid sentence, and then the lady that was on the phone for that 15 minutes instead of doing her job after I pressed that service bell 5 Times, she came to the window being extra loud instead of explaining it because how in the hell am I suppose to know any of this if a notice was not sent. She was loud and rude and I basically grabbed my stuff up and left because darling, y’all customer service is beyond horrible. I hope to never come back here period. She informed me that my package was sent back to Florida and is being sent back, how in the hell am I suppose to know this? I’ll wait

name: Yemimah Johnson
text: Wish I could give this location zero stars! Dropped a package off 3 weeks ago, and just found out that it's still sitting at the post office!! Not only that, I mailed out an important letter over 2 months ago, and the recipient never received it to this day. The lines are usually long at this location, with only one Clerk working the counter. Please get the other workers in the back to help! Overhaul needed desperately here ASAP. Change is in order!!!!!

name: Emma Budraitis
text:
I cannot give this location low enough stars. It is the worst Post Office I have ever experienced.  I don't normally give bad reviews, but every time I have been to this post office there have been problems. Meaning they don't have the stamps I need. What's a post office without stamps?!
In my experience they usually only have one worker at the counter helping customers, so there is a line out the door. The first time I went there they did not have post card stamps, and told me, with an attitude that I would have to get them somewhere else. (I'm sorry, I thought I was at the post office.)
The second time I went for Christmas stamps, which they had, but when I inquired about purchasing normal Forever stamps, the lady opened her draw, said she had none and walked away from her lane, saying she was closed. This left me standing there, wondering if anyone was going to help me, if she was coming back, or if the other worker even acknowledge what just happened. Thankfully she helped me after she finished with her customer, only to find out that she too did not have any Forever stamps. I resorted to purchasing additional Christmas stamps instead.
This location has always seemed inefficient, ill-supplied, and the workers incompetent. You ask a question and they just stare at you, then slowly respond with a poor answer. I hate to review this so poorly, but it's just the truth.
Pick another location to take care of your mailing needs.

name: Ann Thompson
text: I didnt recieve package as indicated by tracking info. They were incredibly helpful and reasonably prompt investigating the  packages where abouts. Concluded with my recieving package only 3 days later than estimated by Amazon.

name: The Mingus Files
text: I live and work at a uhaul this post office delivers to. We do not have a set carrier and when they don't feel like coming here they dont. I have had packages sent back because the carrier said undeliverable when it absolutely is. I've had them say business not open when it is clearly our business hours. These people are lazy and half assed.

name: Bill Lambert
text: Rude

name: charice Mcswain
text:
Been on hold for about 50 minutes uggghhhhh

After several call backs I'm back on hold again uggghhhhh, the girl that was helping first just left me on hold abs left for the day smh

name: Tykira Mumphrey
text: They are stealing Christmas gifts !!

name: Zuliam Aguirre
text: Great customer service

name: Joe D
text: post office not at this location

name: Remy Way
text: I moved from Colorado, and this location blows all the usps locations in Colorado out of the water. This is the best USPS location I have been to, and I go there at least twice a week. Keep up the solid work, thank you.

name: jesse wilkins
text: They said they tried to deliver my package and was unsuccessful.. This is a lie because I was in my front yard cleaning the yard all day untill 8:00 p.m..I seen the mail man come down my street, but never delivered my package..

name: Valarie Hansen
text: Went to pick up my mail from being on hold and the lady told me I had no  mail at all even trash mail  after being gone for 2 weeks????? Ridiculous!!! We ALWAYS have trash mail every single day and I know when my power bill is due. Just didn't want to take time to look since it got busy behind me.

name: Joel Stampede
text:
"The people are nice but sometimes they are slow or don't know what they are doing."

Well said.  Expanding on that, I will say that no matter how many people are waiting, the pace never picks up, and it always takes both clerks to try and solve one problem.

Added to that, if I bring in a package at 8 A.M. on Monday, according to the Tracking Number, the package never leaves the Theodore Post office until Tuesday evening.

name: Michael Burrough
text: Totally unreliable mail delivery.  Some days the carrier doesn't show up at all and other days doesn't deliver the mail until after 5pm. I don't understand, really I don't. Going in the post office is also always a terrible experience. SO SLOW!!! Always only one employee working the counter even when the line is out the door. When someone mentions something to her she smirks and says that she is retired and doesn't need this job and that she just works there for something the do, which is exactly how she acts. I have heard her say this a few time, once to me directly. She is "nice" but it's a phony, fake nice, masochist nice, as to say "If you don't like it then leave", with a smile. The other employees there are rude and condescending and causally walk around listening to their headphones or talking and joking with each other like they are on the playground, meanwhile there are customers waiting for the only desk clerk working. The WORST post office and customer service ever, and they NEVER answer the phone. If I could give 0 stars I would. Something needs to be done because these people are going to run the post office outta busniess. UNPROFESSIONAL! And these are supposed to be government employees!?

name: Tameka Love
text: Call the post office because I was missing a package that they supposed to deliver. I spoke to Greg the supervisor at the Theodore location and like any conversation I start off with speaking "Hi, how are doing?" His reply "Busy. What you need?" After telling them all the information; the tone in his voice, the words he used; I clearly could tell he cared less.

name: Janice Desantis
text: Sat. 7/1/2017 = NO MAIL AS OF 5:02 PM, for the entire residential development = WHAT GIVES?????   I love our mail-delivery person, but they must be on holiday as our usual delivery time is about 11:30 am, and today, no mail at all for anyone .... USPS is supposed to be open today, but you can't reach them after 11am on a Saturday, and it's the 4th of July holiday = figures!!

name: Angela Serigny
text: The mail carrier won't bring any packages to our house and they always mix- up mail with our neighbors and ours. The only time the carrier actually came to our house was when she was training someone, that confirmed that they know for sure where the house is but simply refuses to deliver anything to our home. The times I've been in this post office there's always a line and the last time I was going to overnight express mail a package to my daughter but all the clerk would tell me is I had the wrong box and I'd need to use their other box; she said it was over there and pointed instead of helping me. She could've rang up the right box with the express delivery so all I'd have to do was bring it back to her after I switched boxes even though the box I'd used was no problem with a different post office about a month prior to this visit. I've got severe back problems, Neuropathy, and other medical problems and after standing in the line I just wanted to leave before collapsing. I paid to send it within a 2 - 3 day arrival because that's the box the clerk told me I had. Next time I'll probably just go to a different post office.

name: Chris Knight
text: Man worst branch ever!!! Extremely rude and petty and beyond that don't even follow the post offices orders like refused to hold my mail on several occasions when I had a hold mail put in with confirmation number

name: Alicia Robertson
text: Horrible customer service. One time when I went I was asked to put my address on the screen for conformation, I did, the lady said put your address. I responded with I put it down, she then told me to do it again because it wasn’t right. My most recent time of going, I was picking up a package for my mom, said my address, was asked for my address again, then I had to figure out that he meant my license to see my address. I was never asked for my address. They are not welcoming at this location.

name: Calypso Olivia
text: Horrible customer service! I called in to find out if my package was there because for whatever reason they decided not to deliver it to me & the guy told me he couldn’t help me at all without a tracking number and then hung up on me! I called back once I had my tracking information and the man refused to help me. Said he was too busy helping others and I would just have to come in! I told him I couldn’t because of my work hours and he basically said oh well I’m busy trying to help the two customers in front of me! How rude and unprofessional.

name: Cornbread- 83
text: The people are nice but I never know when to expect my mail somedays it around 11am and others it's after 2 pm

name: Chilton Morgan
text: Was expecting my package today but it never showed up.... who delivers mail at 8 at night anyways?!.....

name: Denise Brown
text: The 2 ladies working up front are rude a-- b----
